price: Fakkeenya Nuuf godheeti, uumama isaa dagatee “erga isheen bututtee lafee eenyutu jiraachisa?” jedhe.
arabic: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلٗا وَنَسِيَ خَلۡقَهُۥۖ قَالَ مَن يُحۡيِ ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waḍaraba lanā mathalan wanasiya khalqahu qāla man yuḥ'yī al-ʿiẓāma wahiya ramīmun
